Movies.title: Army Of The Dead
Movies.description: Vegas is a zombie wasteland. But with $200 million on the line, they're ready to roll the dice on an impossible heist.

Movies.title: Homefront
Movies.description: A former DEA agent moves his family to a quiet town, where he soon tangles with a local meth druglord.

Movies.title: The Take
Movies.description: A young pickpocket and an unruly CIA agent team up on an anti-terrorist mission in France.

Movies.title: The Matrix
Movies.description: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

Movies.title: HOME
Movies.description: When misfit alien Oh mistakenly sends a party invite to the entire galaxy, he goes on the run to avoid trouble and befriends spunky human girl Tip.

Movies.title: Dog Gone Trouble
Movies.description: The privileged life of a pampered dog named Trouble is turned upside-down when he gets lost and must learn to survive on the big-city streets.

Movies.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
Movies.description: Kooky zoo animals from New York adjust to new digs after getting stuck in Africa, but there's still no place like home.

Movies.title: Cloudy with a chance of Meatballs
Movies.description: When inventor Flint Lockwood makes clouds rain food, the citizens of Chewandswallow can feed themselves. But a bowl of disaster is about to overflow.

Movies.title: Bebe's Kids
Movies.description: When ladies' man Robin meets Jamika, he falls head over heels, but she greets him with four surprises: her son and her girlfriend Bebe's three kids.

Movies.title: The Wrong Missy
Movies.description: Tim thinks he's invited the woman of his dreams on a work retreat to Hawaii, realizing too late he mistakenly texted someone from a nightmare blind date.

Movies.title: The Breakfast Club
Movies.description: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

Movies.title: Superbad
Movies.description: Hoping to have sex before college, high school seniors Seth and Evan try to score booze for a huge party, leading to a series of wild misadventures.

Movies.title: A Quiet Place
Movies.description: Following the deadly events at home, the Abbott family must now face the terrors of the outside world as they continue their fight for survival in silence. Forced to venture into the unknown, they quickly realize that the creatures that hunt by sound are not the only threats that lurk beyond the sand path.

Movies.title: US
Movies.description: Accompanied by her husband, son and daughter, Adelaide Wilson returns to the beachfront home where she grew up as a child. Haunted by a traumatic experience from the past, Adelaide grows increasingly concerned that something bad is going to happen.

Movies.title: BrightBurn
Movies.description: After a difficult struggle with fertility, Tori Breyer's dreams of motherhood come true with the arrival of a mysterious baby boy. Brandon appears to be everything Tori and her husband, Kyle, ever wanted -- bright, talented and curious about the world

Movies.title: The Nun
Movies.description: A priest with a haunted past and a novice on the threshold of her final vows are sent by the Vatican to investigate the death of a young nun in Romania and confront a malevolent force in the form of a demonic nun.
